title: Vaishnavi Emerald Haaram: A Timeless Heirloom
materials: High-Quality Emeralds (Panna) with exceptional clarity and vibrant green hue
Polki Diamonds (uncut diamonds). Crafted with exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: A magnificent two-strand Haaram featuring meticulously set, oval-cut Emeralds surrounded by Polki Diamonds. The centerpiece is a stunning floral motif with a large pear-shaped emerald pendant, adding a touch of regal elegance. Classic temple jewelry design with intricate detailing around the emeralds.
occasions: and any occasion where you wish to make a statement of timeless elegance.
description: This Emerald Haaram is a rare blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The high-quality Emeralds are carefully selected for their exceptional color and clarity. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural brilliance, making it a truly unforgettable piece. A valuable investment and a treasured heirloom to pass down through generations. The intricate detailing and stunning gemstone arrangement reflect the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry.
